sentences.en: " I think you are vile and mercenary,'said Scarlett, but her remark was automatic.
sentences.cn: " 我看你这个人很卑鄙,惟利是图, "思嘉说, 不过口气是机械的.

sentences.en: Besides, her object was not purely mercenary.
sentences.cn: 此外, 她所追求的目的不单纯是为了金钱.

sentences.en: He will tell you I am mercenary.
sentences.cn: 他会对你说,我是财迷心窍.

sentences.en: His action was prompted by mercenary motives.
sentences.cn: 贪图钱财的动机促使他采取行动.

sentences.en: James is so mercenary that he'd turn in his own mother for the reward money.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯太唯利是图了,他为领取赏钱竟出卖了自己的母亲.

sentences.en: Mercenary Heroes get mercenary parties to join them for free.
sentences.cn: 佣兵英雄也可以免费让佣兵队伍加入他们.
唯利是图的人贪求财富.

sentences.en: Of course, when the mercenary marriage proves disappointing, there always divorce.
sentences.cn: 当然, 为钱而结合的婚姻总是令人失望, 而后往往是以离婚收场.

sentences.en: She did it for purely mercenary reasons.
sentences.cn: 她这么做纯粹是为了钱。

sentences.en: Some went as mercenary soldiers , others as merchants or craftsmen, some in organized groups , others singly.
sentences.cn: 他们要么作为雇佣军, 要么作为商人或工匠艺人; 要么有组织地成群结队或单独前往.

sentences.en: The doctor thought it very vulgar to be precipitate in accusing people of mercenary motives.
sentences.cn: 医生认为不分青红皂白把别人斥为抱有贪图钱财的动机反而会显出自己的庸俗.

sentences.en: The mercenary troops are embarking on new adventures there.
sentences.cn: 这支雇佣军正在那里干新的冒险勾当.

sentences.en: The mercenary wore his ruby - eye patch over eye this day, Dinin noted.
sentences.cn: 狄宁注意到,今天佣兵右眼上罩着他的红宝石色眼罩.

sentences.en: This put her affection out of suspicion of mercenary ends.
sentences.cn: 这样就可以使她的爱不至于沾染上有所贪图的色彩.

sentences.en: Updated two Act 5 mercenary names to Klar and Tryneus.
sentences.cn: 第五幕增加两个雇佣兵名字.

sentences.en: Viture flies from the heart of a mercenary man.

phrases.tran_cn: 买卖婚姻；着眼实利的婚姻

trans.tran_cn: 雇用的，图利的，唯利是图的
trans.tran_en: only interested in the money you may be able to get from a person, job etc
a soldier who fights for any country or group that will pay him
